short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the UBC course schedule pages to show courses in the local timezone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension changes the course schedule pages on the University of British Columbia students site so they are in your local timezone.

We are open source under the MIT license. Visit us on GitHub at https://github.com/lf-/ssc-tz
